name: Bevy is you
description:
HOW TO PLAY THE GAME:
WASD or Arrow Keys - to move up, left, down, and right

T or C - to undo moves

R or Z - to redo moves

WHY DID I CREATE A CLONE OF AN ALREADY EXISTING GAME?

I was trying out a new game engine called "Bevy," and thought it's approach to coding games was similar to some concepts with "Baba is you." So, I wanted to try out how hard it would be to implement the game in Bevy, and it's only taken 2 weeks to get to this point.

Github: https://github.com/mp768/Bevy-is-you
